document.full_text: weak first-quarter results at telefonica  on friday showed the telecoms heavyweight sagging under a stagnant economy in spain, and with latin america still driving earnings but with signs of fatigue.
document.title: telefonica q1 falls short, weak spain weighs
lines_and_colors: weak first-quarter results at telefonica  on friday showed the telecoms heavyweight sagging under a stagnant economy in spain, and with latin america still driving earnings but with signs of fatigue.
